mapper.insert:
insert into shopee_cat_stat (parent_category_id, cat_id, total_pro_count, total_sold_sum, cat_compete_weight, region_no,version) values
(#{item.parentCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.catId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.totalProCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.totalSoldSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.catCompeteWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.regionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.version,jdbcType=BIGINT})
